special_text:
Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield tapped and under your control, untap it.
[+1]: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[-7]: Untap all lands you control. Until end of turn, they become 3/3 Elemental creatures with flying. They're still lands.
